overview: Brock Anderson has over 20 years experience in supply chain and manufacturing in major multinational corporations including rapid-growth technology organizations and specialty manufacturing businesses. Prior to joining BelAir Networks, Brock was Director of Strategic Sourcing for Canadian Pacific Railway. Previously, with Nortel Networks, he spent over a decade as a Director in various Supply Chain and Manufacturing positions focussed on wireless and enterprise voice products. He has also held purchasing and sourcing management positions with Motorola, Philips Electronics, and JRC Canada. Brock has experience in Lean Manufacturing, Six Sigma and SOX Compliance processes and studied Business Administration at John Abbott College, Montreal, Quebec.
